Class Driver

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockDriver

    public class Driver
extends User
    A Singleton controller class for Driver activities.

      • instantiate

        public static void instantiate(Profile profile)
        Creates an instance of Driver using a user's Profile. Meant to be called during login. Must be called before other Driver methods are used.
        Parameters:
        profile - The user's profile.

      • executeDriverCommands

        public void executeDriverCommands()

      • updateAcceptedRequests

        public void updateAcceptedRequests()
        Updates the list of accepted requests from the server. Also checks to see if a rider has accepted this driver on any of their requests. If so, acceptedRequest will be set to the accepted request and the request can be started.

      • riderHasAccepted

        public Request riderHasAccepted()
        Check if a rider has accepted any of the driver's offers.
        Returns:
        the Request that the rider has accepted, or null if none.

      • getRequest

        public Request getRequest(java.lang.String requestId)
        Get a Request in acceptedRequests with a given id. Null if it doesn't exist
        Parameters:
        requestId - id of the request
        Returns:
        a Request with the given id, or null if nonexistent

      • filterRequestsByPrice

        public void filterRequestsByPrice(double price)
        Removes from searchedRequests requests that don't meet a threshold price
        Parameters:
        price - The minimum price to filter by

      • filterRequestsByPricePerKm

        public void filterRequestsByPricePerKm(double price)
        Removes from searchedRequests requests that don't meet a threshold price per km travelled
        Parameters:
        price - The minimum price to filter by
